title: The Cowboy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose four players to Wrangle.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- RB/CTRL Immune
- If a player you Wrangle attempts to visit another player you Wrangle, you learn who attempted to visit who, and roleblock them.
- Your ability goes on cooldown for a night after using it.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5345
*A rancher with delusions of grandeur. He imagines unbound stories of heroism as he drives the last cattle in for the longest dusk of the week.*
